description: Allows the mob to float around like the Ghast.
title: Float Wander

additional_collision_buffer.title: Additional Collision Buffer
additional_collision_buffer.description: If true, the mob will have an additional buffer zone around it to avoid collisions with blocks when picking a position to wander to.

allow_navigating_through_liquids.title: Allow Navigating Through Liquids
allow_navigating_through_liquids.description: If true, allows the mob to navigate through liquids on its way to the target position.

float_duration.title: Float Duration
float_duration.description: Range of time in seconds the mob will float around before landing and choosing to do something else.

float_wander_has_move_control.title: Float Wander Has Move Control
float_wander_has_move_control.description: If true, the MoveControl flag will be added to the behavior which means that it can no longer be active at the same time as other behaviors with MoveControl.

must_reach.title: Must Reach
must_reach.description: If true, the point has to be reachable to be a valid target.

navigate_around_surface.title: Navigate Around Surface
navigate_around_surface.description: If true, will prioritize finding random positions in the vicinity of surfaces, i.e. blocks that are not Air or Liquid.

random_reselect.title: Random Reselect
random_reselect.description: If true, the mob will randomly pick a new point while moving to the previously selected one.

surface_xz_dist.title: Surface XZ Distance
surface_xz_dist.description: The horizontal distance in blocks that the goal will check for a surface from a candidate position. Only valid when 'navigate_around_surface' is true.

use_home_position_restriction.title: Use Home Position Restriction
use_home_position_restriction.description: If true, the mob will respect home position restrictions when choosing new target positions. If false, it will choose target position without considering home restrictions.

xz_dist.title: XZ Distance
xz_dist.description: Distance in blocks on ground that the mob will look for a new spot to move to. Must be at least 1.

y_dist.title: Y Distance
y_dist.description: Distance in blocks that the mob will look up or down for a new spot to move to. Must be at least 1.

y_offset.title: Y Offset
y_offset.description: Height in blocks to add to the selected target position.
